amendment.description: To establish a committee on student privacy policy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2080 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 0. Record Vote Number: 231.

action.text: Amendment SA 2080 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4923-4925, S4926; text: CR S4925) To establish a committee on student privacy policy.
